channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Ford turns to Amazon to give used cars sales a boost
item.description: Amazon Autos, which kicked off last year with Hyundai, initially started with new cars. The deal with Ford pushes it into used car territory.

item.title: Netflix : voici comment accéder à 36 000 catégories cachées avec des codes secrets
item.description: Vous passez plus de temps à chercher qu'à regarder sur Netflix ? Vous avez l'impression de voir toujours les mêmes recommandations tourner en boucle ? C'est normal : l'algorithme ne vous montre qu'une infime partie du catalogue. Derrière votre page d'accueil se cachent plus de 36 000 catégories accessibles via des codes secrets. Voici comment les utiliser. ...

item.title: Samsung's "The Wall" is the biggest LED display you can get for your office or workplace - and it's just got even bigger and more detailed
item.description: Samsung’s The Wall MPF series now delivers large-scale LED displays with AI upscaling, high contrast, and front-access modules for easier maintenance.

item.title: Reading a Quantum Clock Costs More Energy Than Actually Running One
item.description: Quantum timekeeping comes with the paradoxes of quantum mechanics, a new study suggests.

item.title: I’m a phones expert and I’m warning you not to buy these 13 phones on Black Friday
item.description: Black Friday is a great time to snag a cut-price phone, but don't get caught out by buying one of these soon-to-be-outdated models.

item.title: Amazon AU's Black Friday 2025 sale is here – these are the 145+ best deals handpicked by experts
item.description: There's thousands of Black Friday deals on Amazon right now and we've selected the top options on headphones, speakers, cameras, smartphones, vacuums, air fryers and more.

item.title: iOS 26 : voici la fonction cachée qui prolonge l’autonomie de votre iPhone
item.description: Apple a glissé une nouvelle fonction dans iOS 26 qui pourrait bien changer votre quotidien : l'Alimentation adaptative. Ce mode intelligent utilise Apple Intelligence pour apprendre vos habitudes et ajuster automatiquement la consommation d'énergie. Mais attention, si vous n'avez pas un iPhone 17, il faudra l'activer manuellement.

item.title: This Hisense mini-LED TV was already a great value, and it’s now selling for under $500 ahead of Black Friday
item.description: Hisense's lowest-cost mini-LED TV looks great, and it's now selling for a record-low price.

item.title: Achetez de la mémoire vive avant qu’il ne soit trop tard
item.description: Vous projetiez d'upgrader votre PC cet hiver ? Mauvaise nouvelle : la RAM est devenue un produit de luxe. Les fabricants comme Asus et MSI se ruent sur le marché au comptant pour acheter de la mémoire en panique. Les prix ont doublé en un mois, et les experts annoncent des pénuries jusqu'en 2027.

item.title: Un étrange bestiaire d'étoiles bosoniques et cannibales laissé par le Big Bang ?
item.description: « L'Univers est non seulement plus étrange que nous le supposons, mais plus étrange que nous pouvons le supposer » est une célèbre citation attribuée au biologiste britannique John Burdon Sanderson Haldane. Est-ce vraiment le cas ? On peut de toute façon se le demander lorsque l'on prend...

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Tuesday, November 18 (game #891)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Tuesday, November 18 (game #625)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Tuesday, November 18 (game #1394)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: A Waymo Robotaxi May Have Recorded Footage of a Deadly Shooting in San Francisco
item.description: The robotaxi was parked nearby, emergency dispatchers have revealed.

item.title: A New ‘Star Trek’ Comic Gives Uhura the Full Spotlight
item.description: Just in time for next Black History Month, 'Star Trek' is doing another what-if comic that takes Uhura back to the Civil Rights Movement.

item.title: Bose’s noise-canceling QuietComfort Headphones are more than 50 percent off
item.description: Traveling during the holidays can be chaotic and loud, but a quality pair of over-ear headphones can provide much-needed peace and quiet on your journey. Fortunately, you can currently snag Bose’s QuietComfort Headphones on sale at Amazon for an all-time low of $169.99 ($180 off) in select colors. That’s more than 50 percent off the […]

item.title: Googles AI Overview thinks Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 is a fake game
item.description: Google's AI Overview thinks 'Call of Duty: Black Ops 7' is a fake game

item.title: How Jeffrey Epstein used SEO to bury news about his crimes
item.description: On December 11th, 2010, Jeffrey Epstein was fretting about what came up if you Googled him. By this time Epstein had already pleaded guilty to soliciting prostitution with a child and was a registered sex offender, and just a few days earlier he had been photographed in Central Park taking a stroll with Prince Andrew. […]

item.title: Ramp hits $32B valuation, just three months after hitting $22.5B
item.description: In 2025 alone, Ramp has leapt from being worth $13 billion to $32 billion with new rounds every few months.

item.title: ‘A parent’s worst nightmare’: Lawsuits pile up against ByHeart baby formula startup after wave of infant illnesses
item.description: No fewer than 5 legal complaints have been filed in federal courts since last week in the wake of multiple recalls and an ongoing investigation by the FDA. Last week, the baby nutrition company ByHeart recalled all of its infant formula over concerns that it may be contaminated with Clostridium botulinum, the bacterium that causes infant botulism.

item.title: Jeff Bezos’s New AI Hardware Startup Isn’t Even His Biggest Moonshot
item.description: He's not the only one looking up, either.

item.title: Microsoft unveils its first "AI superfactory" - here's what the future of computing will really look like
item.description: Microsoft connects large AI data centers into a single superfactory, using dense hardware, fast fiber, and advanced cooling to handle growing model demands.

item.title: The first Apple Silicon MacBook Air M1 is five, and it really did change everything
item.description: Five years ago, Apple unveiled Apple silicon, transforming all Macs and luring me away from Windows – possibly forever.

item.title: An AI May Be Listening to Your Next Doctor’s Appointment
item.description: Here's why you shouldn't panic just yet.

item.title: La carte Vitale va pouvoir s’installer dans votre smartphone dès demain
item.description: 28 millions de Français vont pouvoir enregistrer leur carte Vitale dans leur smartphone et ce, dès demain. L'application Carte Vitale devient en effet disponible partout en France.

item.title: ‘The Mandalorian and Grogu’ Is About Making Mando One of the Good Guys
item.description: Din Djarin's arc from murky bounty hunter will climax with him as an explicit hero in the next 'Star Wars' movie.

item.title: How to watch Sundar Pichai: Running The Google Empire online — it's FREE
item.description: Google’s CEO breaks his silence on leading tech’s biggest giant through its most turbulent era. — and you can watch Sundar Pichai: Running The Google Empire online and for free

item.title: I'm a headphones expert: these are the 7 Black Friday headphones and earbuds deals I want you to avoid – and why
item.description: Most sites might simply pile the deals high and let you click through to buy – I won't do that, because I'm TechRadar's Audio Editor and I want you to buy better

item.title: Your online reservations are telling restaurants all about you
item.description: Are you a red wine drinker? A high spender? Or perhaps you're a slow eater, the sort who takes up a restaurant's table for longer than they'd like. You might not even know - but OpenTable does. Those are just a few of the notes that the reservation platform has started serving up to some […]
